list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small sharp-pointed organ at the end of the abdomen of bees, wasps, ants, and scorpions, capable of inflicting a painful or dangerous wound by injecting poison.
a carefully planned operation, typically one involving deception.
wound or pierce with a sting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was stung by a jellyfish
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta bị đâm bởi một con sứa

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an elaborate fraud that stung a bank for thousands
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một gian lận phức tạp đã tạo ra một ngân hàng cho hàng ngàn
